official_title: A joint resolution requesting the President to proclaim the period of July 16 through 24 of each year as "United States Space Observance".

summary.text: Authorizes the requests the President to designate the period of July 16 through July 24 of each year as "United States Space Observance."

titles.title: A joint resolution requesting the President to proclaim the period of July 16 through 24 of each year as "United States Space Observance".
